duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform basic laboratory experiments under general supervision as well as more advanced duties under direct supervision.
Assist in developing procedures and protocols to support experiments.
Cooperate, communicate, and relate well to all levels of the Medical Center. Listen carefully to others and communicate effectively.
Analyze problems as they occur and determine the appropriate solutions. Seek guidance as necessary and advise appropriate personnel of situations requiring intervention or follow-up attention.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's of Science Degree in Life Sciences or a related field is preferred.
